name: Handwritten digit classifier
tagline: Classifies handwritten digits using Support Vector Machine
body:
### Handwritten-digit-classifier-using-SVM Classifies handwritten digits using Support Vector Machine Implementation of a mini project descibed in this document I found [here](http://www.academia.edu/1161261/Handwritten_Digit_Classification_using_Support_Vector_Machines) I used the data from [here](http://cis.jhu.edu/~sachin/digit/digit.html) **Files**
preparedataset.m - prepares the data for processing.
computefeatures.m - computes various features for each digit image.
trainandclassify.m - trains svm with the features and then use the test data to classify. one-Vs-one svm is used.
Confusion Matrix for 700 training sample and 300 test samples per digit. ![Confusion Matrix](https://github.com/harshkn/HandwrittenDigitClassifier/raw/master/confusionmatrix.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
